headline.main: RUSSIAN ATTACKS AND MUD TURNING TIDE AT MOSCOW; Germans Reported Digging In -- New Salient Is Opened Up 62 Miles From Capital DEFENDERS GAIN 10 MILES Peril in South Remains Great -- Nazis Admit Soviet Army Is Striking in Center RUSSIAN ATTACKS AND MUD HALT FOE

lead_paragraph: BERNE, Switzerland, Wednesday, Oct. 29 -- Rain and Red Army strategy have turned the tide of battle west of Moscow, it was announced this morning by an authoritative commentator on the Moscow radio.
abstract: USSR counter-attacks and mud turn tide of Moscow battle
snippet: BERNE, Switzerland, Wednesday, Oct. 29 -- Rain and Red Army strategy have turned the tide of battle west of Moscow, it was announced this morning by an authoritative commentator on the Moscow radio....

byline.original: By DANIEL T. BRIGHAMBy Telephone to THE NEW YORK TIMES
